parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: JobIds
parameters.description: The list of serverless job IDs or subtask IDs (array jobs).

parameters.name: JobNames
parameters.description: The names of the serverless jobs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [ListRegions](~~188593~~) operation to query the list of regions where E-HPC is supported.

parameters.name: StartOrder
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to sort the serverless jobs by the job start time. Valid values:

*   Asc: ascending order.
*   Desc: descending order.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the serverless job. Valid values:

*   All
*   Pending
*   Running
*   Succeeded
*   Canceled
*   Failed

Default value: All.

parameters.name: SubmitOrder
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to sort the serverless jobs by the job submission time. Valid values:

*   Asc: ascending order.
*   Desc: descending order.

parameters.name: SubmitTimeEnd
parameters.description:
The latest time at which the job is submitted.

>  You can use this parameter to query the job list based on the job submission time.

parameters.name: SubmitTimeStart
parameters.description:
The earliest time at which the job is submitted.

>  You can use this parameter to query the job list based on the job submission time.
